select m.member_No, m.nick, m.intro , mei.profileImgNo from SP inner join member m on sp.member_no = m.member_no inner join (select member_no , min(image_no) as profileImgNo from mei group by member_no) mei on mei.member_no = sp.member_no where SOCIAL_NO = #{SOCIAL_NO}

select s.title, TO_CHAR(s.startdate, 'MM/DD HH24:mm') as startDate, TO_CHAR(s.enddate, 'MM/DD HH24:mm') as endDate ,smi.image_no from social s inner join sp p on s.social_no = p.social_no inner join smi on smi.social_no = s.social_no where s.hiddenyn ='N' and p.member_no = #{memberNo}
